author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all, getting rid of one more (hopefully last) deprecation warning in the `OnlineDB` area, thanks to the new flagging from core s/w group (see https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/jenkins-artifacts/pull-request-integration/PR-cfc78f/23964/build-logs/)
Technical, part of the migrations in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36404.
Profited to clean-up headers, unused methods and merging plugin header with implementation.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: get rid of more deprecation warnings in `OnlineDB`
